storyInfo: Lavinia and Demetri meet in a winery. She suspects him of being involved with the accident, but chances upon Ingrid who is asking around about the news, and the two get acquainted. After Ingrid leaves, Lavinia finds out the Vulpo lady was in fact at the scene on that very night.

attributes.content: <p=2>November 6th, 1100    8:20 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: I recommend the 'Red Tongue Sour'. They say it's made like how the Sami do.
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: Are you mad, Mane? Ordering cocktails at a winery? We'll be laughed out of here!
attributes.name: Undercover Officer B

attributes.content: *ahem* Didn't we taste a similar looking one when we were in Columbia last month?
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: I just wanted to reminisce about our honeymoon a little, tesoro.
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: (Remember our undercover classes at the police academy. Sometimes we have to be conspicuous to cover the others.)
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: (The judge needs more time to clear bystanders from here.)
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: (...Are you sure you didn't pull that just because you wanted to drink it?)
attributes.name: Undercover Officer B

attributes.content: I swear, tesoro!
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: Ssh..! Softer, Mane!
attributes.name: Undercover Officer B

attributes.content: I thought his Nuova Volsinii would be much more lenient.
Signorina, why not have a drink on me? A cocktail, of course.
Let's just say it's a local custom.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: (Mane, he's here...)
attributes.name: Undercover Officer B

attributes.content: Signore, thank you for the generosity, but it's not your place to offer my—
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: I think there's been a misunderstanding. My offer was not directed at you, officer.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: It's been a while, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Care for a drink? You've been standing in that dim corner for a long while.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I was just wondering how long it'd take before you'd pay and leave.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I don't have to worry about the bill here. The Saluzzos never treat their important guests poorly.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Besides, Alberto informed all of his wineries in advance. 'Feel free to taste the wines as you please', were his words.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I never knew you were on such cordial terms with the Saluzzos. What are you and Alberto doing together? Surely you can't be working as a bartender here?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia, I didn't come here to be interrogated.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I'm deeply concerned for Leon. That's the only reason for our meeting tonight.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: 'He's still in a coma', 'He's still in a critical condition'... what kind of answer are you expecting from me? Or should I say, what kind of answer are you afraid of?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: The fact that you are here means his condition isn't that bad.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: ...I still can't meet him?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: You don't have to ask a question you already know the answer to.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Leon is mi fratello. I just hope he's safe and sound.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: A fratello to you? Or Bellone's traitor?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia, everyone who stayed in the Bellones has valid reasons for hating him.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I hate him too. I don't agree with his choice and how he does things today, but I wouldn't deal with him in such a despicable way.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: That won't serve as valid testimony to clear you from suspicion.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Leon got into the accident right before he was supposed to meet you, and you were inside a restaurant near the scene. There is reason to suspect you.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Then, Your Honor, what will you do? Haul me into your court and slowly interrogate the truth from me? I know many of the 'customers' here today are in fact officers.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: ...I won't arrest you without decisive evidence. This is how the law operates, we won't act according to the 'rules' of the famiglie.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: But my suspicion towards you remains.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I'll get to the bottom of this, no matter if you're innocent or not, no matter who was involved. I will get to the truth.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Demetri looks at Lavinia's determined eyes, and sighs.
You haven't changed at all, Lavinia. Still the same as your newbie judge days, daring question a famiglia don.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: I never liked you that much, but... thank you for taking care of Leon for me.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Also, I still have to say: I'll also investigate Leon's accident... I want to know who the culprit is too.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Demetri fetches a nearby wine bottle and gently pulls the cork open.
The liquid swishes within. Only half remains.
Someone gifted me this bottle. I had planned to invite Leon to try it. He should have been the one sitting here...
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Anyway, this glass is on me.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Can I really not see him, Lavinia?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: He leans on the counter, waiting for her answer.
But the judge looks at the glass of red wine and says nothing.
Fine. No point for me to remain here.
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Now would you guys excuse me?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: Or are you planning to detain me under some special procedures for the famiglie under the New Urban Management Act?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: There's no more famiglia here, Demetri.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: ...So I guess I'll go?
attributes.name: Demetri

attributes.content: As you please.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: As laid-back as ever, Venezia senior.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Do your men know their don is currently sitting in an ordinary restaurant right now, while they're waiting to welcome him at the port?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I just missed the food here. I didn't expect you'd be the first face to greet me.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Haha. Come, have a seat, my friend.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: This restaurant isn't as ordinary as you think. I found the chef here from Sicilia. Makes the most authentic bolognese, you should try some.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The younger ones love talking about the future, which isn't a bad thing. However, some traditions shouldn't be abandoned, especially when it comes to Siracusan cuisine.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Anyone who tried innovating a new Saluzzo wine making method would surely be buried six feet under in the vineyard for fertilizer.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Hmph. That's right.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: This bottle of noble rot wine is the first of our new collection. Take it as a welcome gift.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Hm... 1069. A good year.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I can find all of Saluzzo Vino's vintages and subsidiary brands on my rack, but it's been a long time since I've received a bottle from you personally...
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: We haven't been in contact much, Alberto.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Just a decade.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The Morettis ignored the Dodici Famiglie's ban on competing with the other famiglie to monopolize the Orignium trade, and recklessly tried to wipe us out...
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Famiglia Venezia stepped in as a mediator back then, you are certainly worthy of our respect.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: 'Recklessly tried to wipe us out'—Maybe I'm just old and my memory's failing me...
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: But as I recall, it was the Morettis who vanished from Siracusa.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: You swallowed all their Originium businesses, secured your seat in the Grey Hall, and that granted the Saluzzos the current status in Siracusa today.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I'm sure you've experienced more like this than I have.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Our sparse communication has been a boon to us. No one knows what Signora Sicilia would think of our meeting here.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Really?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: She banned Carnevale herself, and yet it's come back from the dead... perhaps she is much more tolerant of Siracusa than we or everyone else in the Grey Hall could imagine.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: A brand new city celebrating one of the oldest festivals. Surely no one would miss attending?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The young ones at city hall are simply doing this to declare that Siracusa will change inside-out... from here.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I just thought of the late Bernardo.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: ...A self-righteous fool.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Not very nice to badmouth a friend who's no longer here.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: I saw trucks going in and out while the police directed traffic, and I couldn't even tell a single family member from the unmasked pedestrians...
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Even the weather here is better than the other Siracusan cities.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: To be honest, the famiglie might not disappear the way Bernardo wanted... but I was finding it hard to believe this was still a Siracusan city until you showed up.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The Venezias have integrated into the city well, senior.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: From the city plate's construction work to the founding of the new government, your famiglia never showed up even once. Then Nuova Volsinii officially started operating, and the Venezias went quickly to work.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Anton was in charge of all that.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Your son-in-law is indeed quite capable.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Venezia Trucking has never flouted any of the New Urban Management Act rules, and even works with city hall to investigate illegal acts by the other famiglie.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: The younger ones are always more eager to get with the times than we are.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: But time is unable to sweep the famiglie's stain away. You know better than me what your vehicle company is doing under the table.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I suppose that's enough gossip for today. Alberto, I've been wondering when you'd finally start talking about the business at hand.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: You knew what I was going to talk about?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Not many new stories in Siracusa these days.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: No matter where you heard it from or whatever it is you're planning, this old man might not be able to do much.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Be it the city hall or Anton, be it a threat or offer to collaborate, I have nothing to do with it all.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Times have changed. I can't say if I like it or not, but I definitely can't stop progress. So I thought, why not leave it to the younger generation instead.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Not afraid they would screw up?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Why not wait and see?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The Venezias climbed to our current position in just three generations, and it was not because of the older generations sticking with their views.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: We have Vulpos, Perros, and Lupos with no blood relations. It is precisely because we accept anyone with ideas with open arms that we are what we are today.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: What I'm doing now is no different than what the old don did.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I came here just to enjoy the festival—but I'm happy you were the first person I saw.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: But old men like us ultimately need to act with decency.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: 'Decency'. I see it's still a favorite in your dictionary.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: That is why we Venezias have managed to stick together to this day.
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: The famiglia's decency frames what we should do or can't do. What say you, Alberto?
attributes.name: Venezia Sr.

attributes.content: Anyone else and I would have called beastshit. But you—
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I can only admit that it's 'truly valuable in Siracusa'.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Mind getting me some spaghetti bolognese?
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: You'd best open this noble wine now instead of bringing it back to Montelupe.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: I'm craving some myself after seeing you enjoy your meal.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: After all, I fear a chance for a leisurely meal like this will be quite rare in future.
attributes.name: Alberto

attributes.content: Umberto never has to look at the clock when working.
He silently counts the number of times the sewing machine's needle bobbed up and down. This is his favorite way of counting time after bidding farewell to his past life.
But now, he dreads the sound of the needle.
The old man's eyes are puffy from his long excruciating day, but he forces himself to keep on sewing to keep it together.
Is that you, Luchino?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Signor Umberto?
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: Oh, it's you, Anna...
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Yes, I'm here to collect the suit I ordered. I formally start at city hall tomorrow!
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: Ah, is Luchino out?
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: He... had something to do.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Wait here while I get your suit.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: How is it?
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: It, it fits perfectly! Grazie mille!
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: No need, you paid me for this.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: But you used an even better material for it...
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: You waited so long for city hall to get back to you, and worked hard for the position too. Of course you deserve a better suit.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Treat it as a greeting gift from us when we moved here. Neighbors should take care of each other.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: We're so lucky to have you as our tailor, Signore.
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: Right, I know Luchino hates sitting around, and I wanted to give him this ticket to the Carnevale show contest rehearsals. It's a good seat.
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: Could you give it to him for me?
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: Haha, everyone knows you only want the best for the boy, but sometimes it's good to let him live a little.
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: He should enjoy his life sometimes, right?
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: ...Grazie, I'll pass it on to him.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I gotta tell you, your boy has a keen eye.
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: When I was here last month queuing for measurements, he was excitedly telling me which customers were important government officials or famiglia guys.
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: He's so proud you're making clothes for those high-ups.
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: A clever boy indeed. But most of our customers—most people who look for a tailor are actually just regular civilians.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: It's rare they get a reason to come here. A rare job opportunity, a beautiful wedding, or even a dignified funeral.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Everyone deserves the decency of tailoring, and we at Tailor de Montano hope to operate for a long time on this basis.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I admire you, Signor Umberto. I'm sure Luchino will be an excellent tailor in future with a great teacher like you.
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.text: 'Do you want to live together with me from today onwards?'
The child had just barely turned three when Umberto found him in a farm with mud all over his face.
'Your eyes are like his... like my son.'
The curious child extends his hand to wipe away the tears from Umberto's eyes, but leaves a filthy gray mark instead.
'What happened to your papa, Luchino, I won't allow it ever again—'

attributes.content: ...You look haggard, signore. Need help?
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: Just age getting to me. Not getting enough rest lately.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Anna, tomorrow's your first day at work. Your brand new suit won't do all the work of impressing your colleagues. Have an early rest... Oh, feel free to get it ironed here anytime.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: I... will close early today and get some rest.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Alright. Ciao, Signor Umberto. Find us anytime if you need anything.
attributes.name: Kindly Neighbor

attributes.content: Umberto holds the ticket in hand, and slumps before his sewing machine. He feels powerless.
After a brief silence, he dials a number.
I know there's no cause to contact you, but this is the only way I have left.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: Luchino's been missing for a whole day. I can't go to the police, I'm afraid that the boy might have gotten himself mixed up in some mob matter—
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: If you're listening, I beg of you—Help me find him... He's the only thing this old man is concerned about... Please, Signora Venezia.
attributes.name: Umberto

attributes.content: <p=2>November 6th, 1100    9:00 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Your Honor, Demetri is gone. Should we pack up as well?
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: Just hold on.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Your face is kinda red, did you drink too much...?
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: Tell the others to continue tracking the vehicle responsible for the accident while we continue investigating the suspects.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It'll be hard, pinning someone down this way...
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: Indeed. Demetri, Alberto, and a 'missing driver'... We have many suspects, but I think there are other ulterior motives behind this incident.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Ever since Nuova Volsinii was founded, there have been many eyes on us—
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Like that customer who hasn't left yet.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Lavinia looks at a corner.
The winery lights are bright, but the wine racks cast a shadow in the corner, with a Vulpo sitting in the dark within.
Her bottle is already half gone, and she has been keeping her distance from everyone else the whole time. So much so that no one has noticed her blade blatantly left on the table.
So that's why you didn't call it a day yet...
attributes.name: Undercover Officer A

attributes.content: Judge Lavinia, yes?
attributes.name: Tipsy Vulpo

attributes.content: To be honest, your actions today—and your scatterbrained officers are giving me a headache.
attributes.name: Tipsy Vulpo

attributes.content: I had planned to pry any interesting info from talkative drunkards here, but it turns out—
attributes.name: Tipsy Vulpo

attributes.content: You're the only one left I can count on.
attributes.name: Tipsy Vulpo

attributes.content: How do you know my name, and—
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Why don't you have a seat first?
attributes.name: Tipsy Vulpo

attributes.content: Sorry, I had no intentions to eavesdrop on your conversation earlier. But a judge and a famiglia don? A classic combination not to be missed.
attributes.name: Tipsy Vulpo

attributes.content: The Vulpo points at her ridiculously large ears and gives a wry smile.
What can I say? I don't know if a good hearing really helps.
attributes.name: Tipsy Vulpo

attributes.content: Ah, right. Ingrid—my name.
attributes.name: Tipsy Vulpo

attributes.content: Now we're even.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You've been staring at my blade for a long time—just a prop. I can register it at city hall if needed.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I've been away from Siracusa for too long and haven't gotten used to the new rules yet.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: ...Ingrid.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I think you know very well these promising officers around us won't be much help.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Are they all under you? Does Nuova Volsinii have the police and judiciary together in the same unit?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: We make do with what we have in these times. They're also serious about their work.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: We'll gladly escort you over to city hall for identity registration, Signora Venezia.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Sure, but after I'm done with my business.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I won't take too long, Lavinia... today I'm just a visitor doing some visiting.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Ingrid sips a mouthful of wine, and lets Lavinia inspect her blade.
You're here for Carnevale?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: For my daughter. She was hurt.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Oripathy. An accident.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Any other questions? I'll be happy to answer.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Signora Venezia. I hope you don't get the wrong idea, but this isn't an interrogation.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's alright. I've crossed paths with judges before. I have no particular opinions on the profession.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: It's not your determination as a judge to crack the case, but your kind concern for a patient that has won my respect.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You know something about the accident. Even though we've been keeping it confidential.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I already told you about my sharp ears, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: So who is 'still in a coma'? A relative? An important friend?
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Sorry, but I'm not answering that.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Hmm, I see accidents do come easy in Siracusa.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: No need to be so vigilant, Lavinia. I can guarantee you my return here has no plans to involve myself in any famiglia affairs.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Hm... Perhaps we may even have a chance to exchange information.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: The two are interrupted by the sound of the winery door opening. The new addition stands at the entrance until the sommelier quickly steps up and humbly takes his coat.
Phew. Signora Venezia, I knew you'd be here.
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Wasn't easy tracking you down... I told the old don about our run-in at de Montano, and he specifically told me he wanted to see—
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Mafioso

attributes.content: The new guest looks in Lavinia's direction and shuts his mouth.
Lavinia and Ingrid stare at the flustered guest in unison, and the surrounding officers pretending to be drunks follow suit.
Signore, we've decanted your wine for you. Allow me to show you the way.
attributes.name: Sommelier

attributes.content: Uh, no, it's fine. I just remembered something.
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: Oh, please wait just a moment while I fetch you a bottle of our winery's newest—
attributes.name: Sommelier

attributes.content: My tuskbeast back home's giving birth today! I shouldn't miss it!
attributes.name: Nervous Mafioso

attributes.content: Lavinia watches him hurriedly grab his coat back from the sommelier. He puts it back on, and even tips his hat off to her before he leaves.
Early this year, that man was jailed for three months for attempting some trouble. I didn't think I'd see him out so soon.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Of course, he absolutely did it on his own and had 'no relations at all' with Venezia Trucking.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Your Honor, I'm starting to think if I should hold you in higher esteem.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: The mafiosi were never this afraid of a judge in the old Siracusa.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Well, Signora Venezia, I actually prefer your attitude—'No particular opinions on the profession.'
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: What Siracusa should revere is the law itself, and not certain individuals.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Haha, a novel idea—though I fear I must get going now.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: To meet with your former don?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: I have no obligation to report every step of my trip to a judge, but I don't wish to complicate matters for you either, Lavinia.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: As I said, I have no intentions of involving myself with famiglia matters.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: I have more pressing things to attend to, but I'll make sure I get them done before the identity registration deadline.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Ah, you should cut down on the alcohol too.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: You can't hold your liquor well at all.
attributes.name: Ingrid

attributes.content: Lavinia watches the Vulpo leave, and directs the eager officers with her eyes to stay put.
She knows what all of you look like, so let's leave it to the others.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Investigate Venezia Trucking, it seems their old don is already in town.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Leon... I'm afraid the situation's getting even more troublesome.
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: Your Honor, the tech department guys just sent over some data from the scene. We need you to review it—
attributes.name: Anxious Officer

attributes.content: Wasn't that area's monitoring system broken?
attributes.name: Lavinia

attributes.content: It's not from that. A private car that broke down was parked in the area for several days and its dash cam happened to record something.
attributes.name: Anxious Officer

attributes.content: A suspicious individual was spotted in an alley. Look, this silhouette looks like a Vulpo, wielding a blade...
attributes.name: Anxious Officer

attributes.content: What's the matter?
attributes.name: Anxious Officer

attributes.content: She was just here.
attributes.name: Lavinia
